name: Sample-chart
title: Consumption of system I/O time
subtitle: Cumulative percentage of platform I/O time consumed by jobs.

yAxis.title: Percentage of Total System I/O Time

series.name: Mira
series.query: select id, unique_iotime, (@csum := @csum + unique_iotime) as cumulative_iotime from jobs_all JOIN (select @csum := 0) r order by unique_iotime desc;

name: nprox-boxplot-chart
title: Job Size Statistics
subtitle: Job size statistics that applications have ever achieved

series.query: select real_exe, min(nprocs) as min_jobsize, avg(nprocs) as avg_jobsize, max(nprocs) as max_jobsize from jobs_all group by real_exe order by max_jobsize desc limit 50
select real_exe, min(agg_perf_MB) as min_jobsize, avg(agg_perf_MB) as avg_jobsize, max(agg_perf_MB) as max_jobsize from jobs_all group by real_exe order by max_jobsize desc limit 15;

name: scatter-chart
title: Average and Maximum I/O Throughput of App

series.query: select avg(total_bytes) as avg_bytes, max(total_bytes) as max_bytes , uid from jobs_all group by uid order by avg_bytes desc ;

name: top-k-app-based-job-size-chart
title: Top 15 Big Time Application based on Job Size
subtitle: Average I/O throughput of the Platform big-time apps’ jobs, by job size.

series.query: select real_exe, min(agg_perf_MB) as min_jobsize, avg(agg_perf_MB) as avg_jobsize, max(agg_perf_MB) as max_jobsize from jobs_all group by real_exe order by max_jobsize desc limit 15

name: top-k-app-based-job-size-chart
title: Top 15 Big Time Application based on Job Size
subtitle: Average I/O throughput of the Platform big-time apps’ jobs, by job size.

series.name: Mira
series.query: select id, unique_iotime, (@csum := @csum + unique_iotime) as cumulative_iotime from jobs_all JOIN (select @csum := 0) r order by unique_iotime desc

name: performance-based-io-interface
title: Job Performance based on the I/O Interface and Job Size
subtitle: I/O throughput for apps that use only POSIX-IO and those that use MPI-IO for at least one file.

series.name: Mira
series.query: select id, unique_iotime, (@csum := @csum + unique_iotime) as cumulative_iotime from jobs_all JOIN (select @csum := 0) r order by unique_iotime desc;

name: io-type
title: Breakdown of Total Run time for each Job

series.name: Mira
series.query: select id, nprocs, total_bytes, (unique_iotime - unique_meta) as localio,unique_meta as localmeta, (shared_time_by_cumul_io_only - shared_time_by_cumul_meta_only) as globalio, (iotime - unique_iotime) as globalmeta, (runtime - iotime) as notio from jobs_all
